00031 #include "config.h"
00032 #include <stdio.h>
00033 #include <syslog.h>
00034 #include <string.h>
00035 #include <gssapi/gssapi.h>
00036 #include "gss_util.h"
00037 #include "gss_oids.h"
00038 #include "err_util.h"
00039 #include "context.h"
00040 
00041 #ifdef HAVE_SPKM3_H
00042 
00043 #include <spkm3.h>
00044 
00045 /*
00046  * Function: prepare_spkm3_ctx_buffer()
00047  *
00048  * Prepare spkm3 lucid context for the kernel
00049  *
00050  *      buf->length should be:
00051  *
00052  *      version 4
00053  *      ctx_id 4 + 12
00054  *      qop 4
00055  *      mech_used 4 + 7
00056  *      ret_fl  4
00057  *      req_fl  4
00058  *      share   4 + key_len
00059  *      conf_alg 4 + oid_len
00060  *      d_conf_key 4 + key_len
00061  *      intg_alg 4 + oid_len
00062  *      d_intg_key 4 + key_len
00063  *      kyestb 4 + oid_len
00064  *      owl alg 4 + oid_len
00065 */
00066 static int
00067 prepare_spkm3_ctx_buffer(gss_spkm3_lucid_ctx_t *lctx, gss_buffer_desc *buf)
00068 {
00069         char *p, *end;
00070         unsigned int buf_size = 0;
00071 
00072         buf_size = sizeof(lctx->version) +
00073                 lctx->ctx_id.length + sizeof(lctx->ctx_id.length) +
00074                 sizeof(lctx->endtime) +
00075                 sizeof(lctx->mech_used.length) + lctx->mech_used.length +
00076                 sizeof(lctx->ret_flags) +
00077                 sizeof(lctx->conf_alg.length) + lctx->conf_alg.length +
00078                 sizeof(lctx->derived_conf_key.length) +
00079                 lctx->derived_conf_key.length +
00080                 sizeof(lctx->intg_alg.length) + lctx->intg_alg.length +
00081                 sizeof(lctx->derived_integ_key.length) +
00082                 lctx->derived_integ_key.length;
00083 
00084         if (!(buf->value = calloc(1, buf_size)))
00085                 goto out_err;
00086         p = buf->value;
00087         end = buf->value + buf_size;
00088 
00089         if (WRITE_BYTES(&p, end, lctx->version))
00090                 goto out_err;
00091         printerr(2, "DEBUG: exporting version = %d\n", lctx->version);
00092 
00093         if (write_buffer(&p, end, &lctx->ctx_id))
00094                 goto out_err;
00095         printerr(2, "DEBUG: exporting ctx_id(%d)\n", lctx->ctx_id.length);
00096 
00097         if (WRITE_BYTES(&p, end, lctx->endtime))
00098                 goto out_err;
00099         printerr(2, "DEBUG: exporting endtime = %d\n", lctx->endtime);
00100 
00101         if (write_buffer(&p, end, &lctx->mech_used))
00102                 goto out_err;
00103         printerr(2, "DEBUG: exporting mech oid (%d)\n", lctx->mech_used.length);
00104 
00105         if (WRITE_BYTES(&p, end, lctx->ret_flags))
00106                 goto out_err;
00107         printerr(2, "DEBUG: exporting ret_flags = %d\n", lctx->ret_flags);
00108 
00109         if (write_buffer(&p, end, &lctx->conf_alg))
00110                 goto out_err;
00111         printerr(2, "DEBUG: exporting conf_alg oid (%d)\n", lctx->conf_alg.length);
00112 
00113         if (write_buffer(&p, end, &lctx->derived_conf_key))
00114                 goto out_err;
00115         printerr(2, "DEBUG: exporting conf key (%d)\n", lctx->derived_conf_key.length);
00116 
00117         if (write_buffer(&p, end, &lctx->intg_alg))
00118                 goto out_err;
00119         printerr(2, "DEBUG: exporting intg_alg oid (%d)\n", lctx->intg_alg.length);
00120 
00121         if (write_buffer(&p, end, &lctx->derived_integ_key))
00122                 goto out_err;
00123         printerr(2, "DEBUG: exporting intg key (%d)\n", lctx->derived_integ_key.length);
00124 
00125         buf->length = p - (char *)buf->value;
00126         return 0;
00127 out_err:
00128         printerr(0, "ERROR: failed serializing spkm3 context for kernel\n");
00129         if (buf->value) free(buf->value);
00130         buf->length = 0;
00131 
00132         return -1;
00133 }
00134 
00135 /* ANDROS: need to determine which fields of the spkm3_gss_ctx_id_desc_t
00136  * are needed in the kernel for get_mic, validate, wrap, unwrap, and destroy
00137  * and only export those fields to the kernel.
00138  */
00139 int
00140 serialize_spkm3_ctx(gss_ctx_id_t ctx, gss_buffer_desc *buf)
00141 {
00142         OM_uint32 vers, ret, maj_stat, min_stat;
00143         void *ret_ctx = 0;
00144         gss_spkm3_lucid_ctx_t     *lctx;
00145 
00146         printerr(1, "serialize_spkm3_ctx called\n");
00147 
00148         printerr(2, "DEBUG: serialize_spkm3_ctx: lucid version!\n");
00149         maj_stat = gss_export_lucid_sec_context(&min_stat, &ctx, 1, &ret_ctx);
00150         if (maj_stat != GSS_S_COMPLETE)
00151                 goto out_err;
00152 
00153         lctx = (gss_spkm3_lucid_ctx_t *)ret_ctx;
00154 
00155         vers = lctx->version;
00156         if (vers != 1) {
00157                 printerr(0, "ERROR: unsupported spkm3 context version %d\n",
00158                         vers);
00159                 goto out_err;
00160         }
00161         ret = prepare_spkm3_ctx_buffer(lctx, buf);
00162 
00163         maj_stat = gss_free_lucid_sec_context(&min_stat, ctx, ret_ctx);
00164 
00165         if (maj_stat != GSS_S_COMPLETE)
00166                 printerr(0, "WARN: failed to free lucid sec context\n");
00167         if (ret)
00168                 goto out_err;
00169         printerr(2, "DEBUG: serialize_spkm3_ctx: success\n");
00170         return 0;
00171 
00172 out_err:
00173         printerr(2, "DEBUG: serialize_spkm3_ctx: failed\n");
00174         return -1;
00175 }
00176 #endif /* HAVE_SPKM3_H */
